Message.Title: Historical margin interest rates
Message.Msg: Hoping some of you can help me. I'm looking for someone who has had a margin account at E*Trade dating back to 2006. I need to get my hands on their historical published margin interest rates, as I believe I have been overcharged. I need them by month dating back to Oct. 2006. Typically, they are held steady for months at a time, so it might not be that difficult to check. Anyone out there who can help? Thanks a million.
